formName: Send your Gaming Duty return online
description: Fill in your Gaming Duty return form online

fields.label: Enter your Gaming Duty registration number
Enter the postcode of your primary place of business
fields.infoText: This is the postcode you gave to HMRC when you registered for Gaming Duty

sections.title: Enter your client’s reference number (also known as an access code)

fields.label: Client's Gaming Duty reference number
fields.helpText: This begins with X and is followed by 3 letters, 5 zeroes and 6 other numbers, for example XABC00000123456

fields.infoText: You can’t complete multiple forms at the same time with the same access code, we hope to introduce this feature soon.

sections.title: What are your client's return dates for this period?
You are completing an Gaming Duty return for the following registration
Choose your Gaming Duty return dates

fields.infoText: The return dates are on the notice to file letter we sent out telling you when your return is due.

fields.label: First name
fields.errorMessage: Enter your first name

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Enter your last name

fields.label: Job title
fields.errorMessage: Enter your job title

fields.errorMessage: Enter your first name

fields.errorMessage: Enter your last name

fields.label: Job title
fields.errorMessage: Enter your job title

fields.infoText: HMRC will only use your contact details to discuss this return.

fields.label: Registered business name
fields.errorMessage: Enter your registered business name

fields.label: Email address (optional)
fields.errorMessage: Enter your email address

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: Include the country and area codes
fields.errorMessage: Enter your telephone number

sections.title: Provide the gross gaming yield (GGY) and the number of premises liable for Gaming Duty at 15% rate
sections.shortName: Gross gaming yield (GGY) and the number of premises liable at 15% duty rate

fields.infoText: HMRC charge a 15% duty on premises earning less than £2,423,500.

fields.label: Number of premises liable for duty at this rate
fields.errorMessage: Enter the number of premises liable for duty at this rate

fields.label: Total amount of gross gaming yield (GGY) chargeable at this rate
fields.shortName: Total amount of GGY chargeable at 15% rate
fields.errorMessage: Enter the total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Provide the GGY and the number of premises liable for Gaming Duty at 20% rate
sections.shortName: GGY and the number of premises liable at 20% duty rate

fields.infoText: HMRC charge a 20% duty on premises earning between £2,423,500 to £4,094,000.

fields.label: Number of premises liable for duty at this rate
fields.helpText: Enter '0' if you have no premises
fields.errorMessage: Enter the number of premises liable for duty at this rate or enter '0' if you have no premises

fields.label: Total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate
fields.shortName: Total amount of GGY chargeable at 20% rate
fields.errorMessage: Enter the total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Provide the GGY and the number of premises liable for Gaming Duty at 30% rate
sections.shortName: GGY and the number of premises liable at 30% duty rate

fields.infoText: HMRC charge a 30% duty on premises earning between £4,094,000 to £7,019,500.

fields.label: Number of premises liable for duty at this rate
fields.helpText: Enter '0' if you have no premises
fields.errorMessage: Enter the number of premises liable for duty at this rate or enter '0' if you have no premises

fields.label: Total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate
fields.shortName: Total amount of GGY chargeable at 30% rate
fields.errorMessage: Enter the total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Provide the GGY and the number of premises liable for Gaming Duty at 40% rate
sections.shortName: GGY and the number of premises liable at 40% duty rate

fields.infoText: HMRC charge a 40% duty on premises earning between £7,019,500 to £13,195,000.

fields.label: Number of premises liable for duty at this rate
fields.helpText: Enter '0' if you have no premises
fields.errorMessage: Enter the number of premises liable for duty at this rate or enter '0' if you have no premises

fields.label: Total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate
fields.shortName: Total amount of GGY chargeable at 40% rate
fields.errorMessage: Enter the total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Provide the GGY and the number of premises liable for Gaming Duty at 50% rate
sections.shortName: GGY and the number of premises liable at 50% duty rate

fields.infoText: HMRC charge a 50% duty on premises earning over £13,195,000.

fields.label: Number of premises liable for duty at this rate
fields.helpText: Enter '0' if you have no premises
fields.errorMessage: Enter the number of premises liable for duty at this rate or enter '0' if you have no premises

fields.label: Total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate
fields.shortName: Total amount of GGY chargeable at 50% rate
fields.errorMessage: Enter the total amount of GGY chargeable at this rate

sections.title: How HMRC worked out your Gaming Duty before corrections

fields.label: Total Gaming Duty to pay before corrections

fields.helpText: You can adjust this return if you have under-declared tax from a previous return
fields.infoText: Do you have adjustments to make in this return?
You can adjust this return if you have under-declared tax from a previous return.

fields.errorMessage: Select yes if you have adjustments to make or no if you have no adjustments

sections.title: Enter the amount of duty under-declared from previous returns

fields.label: Under-declared amount
fields.errorMessage: Enter an amount under-declared from previous returns

sections.title: Enter the Gaming Duty paid on account

fields.label: Gaming Duty paid to date
fields.helpText: Include the total amount paid for the first 3 months of this 6-month return period
fields.errorMessage: Enter the total amount for the first 3 months of this 6-month return period

sections.title: Final payment of Gaming Duty for this period
sections.shortName: Final payment of Gaming Duty for this period

fields.label: How did HMRC calculate the final payment?
fields.infoText:
The final payment is the sum of: 

 * your Gaming Duty for this 6-month return 

 * plus any under-declarations from previous returns 

 * minus the balance paid on account from your previous 3-month return

sections.title: Final payment of Gaming Duty for this period
sections.shortName: Final payment of Gaming Duty for this period

fields.label: How did HMRC calculate the final payment?
fields.infoText:
The final payment is the sum of: 

 * your Gaming Duty for this 6-month return 

 * plus any under-declarations from previous returns 

 * minus the balance paid on account from your previous 3-month return

declarationSection.title: Confirm details and send your return

fields.label: Full name
fields.errorMessage: Enter your full name

fields.label: Job title
fields.errorMessage: Enter your job title

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm we’ve received your return
fields.errorMessage: Enter your email address

fields.infoText:
# Declaration 
By submitting this return, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.

Send your return and payment by the due date to avoid financial penalties. 

If you give incomplete or inaccurate information, we may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a copy of your submitted form as you won’t be able to retrieve it later.
### Make a payment

fields.label: Information about paying Gaming Duty
fields.infoText: If you have already set up a Direct Debit for this tax, you don’t need to do anything else. Your payment will be collected automatically from your bank.

fields.label: Information about paying Gaming Duty
fields.infoText:
You can also use Bacs, CHAPS or Faster Payments to pay. 

Account details: 

 Account name: HMRC GACA 

 Account number: 12000911 

 Sort code: 08-32-002

fields.label: Information about paying Gaming Duty
fields.infoText: You must include your 15 digit Gaming Duty registration number as a payment reference.
[What do you think of this service?]( https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4669761/Feedback-Survey-Gaming-Duty-GD95) (takes 1 minute)
